Title: Beach
Description:
A rocky beach.
A lighthouse towers above.  It seems to stare out at nothing.
A plane wreck is scattered on the bank.
You hear distant thunder.

Title: Boat
Description:
You want to sail as far away from this place as you can, but someone has taken the rudder off the boat.  It must be somewhere on land.
The dreadful thought sinks in: to get away from this island, you will have to explore it.

Title: Dock
Description: The boards are slippery and rotting.  You could take the boat, jump in the ocean, or you go ashore.  Where to now?

Title: Asylum
Description:
It's hard to imagine a place like this would have healed many minds.  Looking at the dubious vials and instruments scattered about, you shudder to think healing might not have been the goal here.
The glint of a needle catches your eye.
A narrow hallway leads to a padded room.

Title: PottersField
Description: A wide field of disturbed earth.  Every few yards, a white stone marks a mass grave. A monument pays respects to those buried here. A sweet but pungent smell rises from an open trench. A lonely sexton wanders the grounds.

Title: Orphanage
Description:
The ruins of an orphanage overlook the Potter's Field.
In the middle of an overgrown courtyard is a deep well.
In the structure above, you hear a frantic rubbing and creaking.
A collapsed wall reveals a toy chest with faded paint.  Its lid is slightly ajar.  A porcelain eye peeks through.

Title: Prison
Description: An abandoned prison.  A guard tower looms over the yard.  A long wall marks the place of execution.  A stairway leads down into the dark.

Title: Woods
Description:
A wooded area.  The trees flex in the wind like bony fingers.
A lone wolf stands at a distance, skeletally thin.
Something is causing a pile of leaves to stir.
A suspicious-looking yellow barrel sticks out of the ground.
